QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: You can find good pumpkins in Harvest Grove and Shady Glen.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Oh, you are such a sweetheart! The kids won't forget what you did for them! You can stop by later and do some pumpkin carving with them.

QUEST.NAME: Chilling by the Fire
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Yo Panda! I am planning a small party at Coconut Beach tonight by the campfire so that we can have fun together! Can you deliver those invitations instead of me? There's one for each of the Pandas like Paige, Izzy and so on. After you're done, could you visit Farmer Dan and see how his task to get the fire ready is going?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I really hope that my friends will enjoy that small party of mine!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank god you're here! The good ol' Questy can't cast his fire spell because the wood there is all gone. Could you find some wood and coal so that we can build a fire? I'll be looking for some too.

QUEST.NAME: Chilling by the Fire
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Thank god you're here! The good ol' Questy can't cast his fire spell because the wood there is all gone. Could you find some wood and coal so that we can build a fire? I'll be looking for some too.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Thank god you're here! The good ol' Questy can't cast his fire spell because the wood there is all gone. Could you find some wood and coal so that we can build a fire? I'll be looking for some too.
QUEST.TEXTEND: We are a good team Panda! Let's get back to the party, everyone is waiting for us! Oh, and I found these coins in the dirt while I was collecting wood - they're yours now.

QUEST.NAME: Planting is Important
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello and g'day fellow farmer! As you probably know, so many Pandas come here in Harvest Grove to pick up different berries. However, Farmer Ned and I can't just keep up with the quantity that's picked up and we need some help with planting raspberries, strawberries and blueberries. Will you help?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: We need to plant all those berries in Harvest Grove and I'm glad that you will be helping out.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for the help - I really don't have the time to plant that many berry plants that often.

QUEST.NAME: Planting in Pots
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Howdy fella! How's it going? We've got a lot of gardening and planting going on here, so you can join in if you want. Actually, we'll be making some pots for planting. Will you take this blueprint to William McWiggles? I've heard he's got some great new pots.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I suppose McWiggles has made the pots on his own.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Hmm, this blueprint seems interesting. However, I haven't made the pots myself - Steve helped me. Head over to him, he may help.

QUEST.NAME: Planting in Pots
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hmm, this blueprint seems interesting. However, I haven't made the pots myself - Steve helped me. Head over to him, he may help.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: You need to talk to Steve, I can't make pots on my own.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Okay, I will help you and Farmer Ned with the pots - I'll need some wood and glue.

QUEST.NAME: Planting in Pots
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Okay, I will help you and Farmer Ned with the pots - I'll need some wood and glue.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Bring me some wood and glue and I'll be glad to help out.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for the materials, I'm starting work right away! I'll give Farmer Ned the pots later.

QUEST.NAME: Learning to Fish
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey my fellow friend! What's up? I've asked Joe today how to fish and he told me that all I need is a lost fishing guidebook, a fishing pole and a net that somebody could have forgotten in Coconut Beach. Will you bring me those?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I really want to try fishing, I'm so excited!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Oh my god, thank you very much! Will you join and show me some techniques later? I've heard that you're very experienced in fishing!

QUEST.NAME: Orange Roses
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Howdy! Have you heard of Orange Roses? They're extremely rare and today I will be trying to create one. For this very specific purpose, I'll need 3 Oranges from The Orchard, 3 Pumpkins from Harvest Grove and 3 Roses from Darby Field. Could you help?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: The orange rose is a very specific type of rose.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done! Now I can start creating the special rose. Thank you!

QUEST.NAME: Fashion Show
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey hey hey! How are you doing fella? Will you be joining Panda's special Fashion Show tonight? I surely will! I'll be making an interesting outfit but I'm not sure how I will combine it all. Oh, by the way, I can't find anywhere the items I need - will you help me and find them? I'll need a Pirate Hat, a pair of Glasses, a pair of Overalls and a pair of Bunny Slippers. May sound a weird combination but everybody will be amazed, I believe!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Weird outfits are my reserved rights. All rights reserved by Lily from mPandanda, haha!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Oh, sweet, you have found all the clothing items I need, thank you so much! Tonight is my time to shine!

QUEST.NAME: Mysterious Occurrences
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello there. I see that you're wondering who I am... Well I'm just another random mysterious guy on mPandanda. Like, this isn't new to the Pandanda Land citizens as if this is something regular. Anyhow, I can share a secret with you. I found some interesting objects and sand that had fallen from them in Shady Glen.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: You can try collecting some sand in Shady Glen and bringing it to Jim.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Oh, interesting! Moon sand! I will analyze it. However, I need a special substance to experiment with it. Visit Questy and I'm sure he'll tell you a way to prepare it.

QUEST.NAME: Mysterious Occurrences
QUEST.TEXTSTART: All right, I see that you need a special liquid for experiments with moon sand. I can't make it, but I'll tell you the recipe and after you're ready with collecting the needed I'll tell you who can make one. So, let's see... We'll need three lumps of coal, some water and 4 coconuts, which we'll chop later.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: All right, I see that you need a special liquid for experiments with moon sand. I can't make it, but I'll tell you the recipe and after you're ready with collecting the needed I'll tell you who can make one. So, let's see... We'll need three lumps of coal, some water and 4 coconuts, which we'll chop later.
QUEST.TEXTEND: I see that you've got what you need. Hold on for a second, let me chop the coconuts into small pieces. I'll have to use some magic, so close your eyes! There you go! Go to Paige and ask her to make the substance for you. Oh, and also tell her a hi from me!

QUEST.NAME: Mysterious Occurrences
QUEST.TEXTSTART: There you go! Go to Paige and ask her to make the substance for you. Oh, and also tell her a hi from me!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: There you go! Go to Paige and ask her to make the substance for you. Oh, and also tell her a hi from me!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Now you can go and give the potion to Jim! Good luck with figuring out this mystery!

QUEST.NAME: Mysterious Occurrences
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Now you can go and give the potion to Jim! Good luck with figuring out this mystery!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Now you can go and give the potion to Jim! Good luck with figuring out this mystery!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Hmm, let's add it to the moon sand you gave me... and voila! Seems like it has fallen off a unidetified flying object or an astronaut suit. Wait... You told me that a stranger has told you about these mysterious occurences. Perhaps it belongs to him or an astronaut... or an alien? You can try going around and finding the answer.

QUEST.NAME: Mysterious Occurrences
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Seems like it has fallen off a unidetified flying object or an astronaut suit. Wait... You told me that a stranger has told you about these mysterious occurences. Perhaps it belongs to him or an astronaut... or an alien? You can try going around and finding the answer.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Seems like it has fallen off a unidetified flying object or an astronaut suit. Wait... You told me that a stranger has told you about these mysterious occurences. Perhaps it belongs to him or an astronaut... or an alien? You can try going around and finding the answer.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Hey, you found me! I'm an astronaut and I just came back from an outer space mission. Seems like there are aliens on the moon! They were kind enough to give me this flying saucer. Sadly, we cannot go back to the moon because they're too shy, but we can travel to outer space! See you later! Oh, and don't forget to get an exclusive suit from me before leaving Shady Glen because it's super rare and perhaps we won't meet anytime soon again.

QUEST.NAME: UFO Sightnings
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there! Have you seen the UFO in Shady Glen? It's very interesting! There are some interesting sounds there so I'd recommend you to check it Shady Glen out, record some sound and bring it to Steve for analysis - it's very interesting and mysterious!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Go to Shady Glen and record some of the sounds there, let's see what kind of aliens have given us this beautiful saucer!
QUEST.TEXTEND: This sounds interesting. As you may know, I'm a sound expert and this does sound kinda... weird. I'm sure Paige would know something more about it, so talk to her!

QUEST.NAME: UFO Sightnings
QUEST.TEXTSTART: This sounds interesting. As you may know, I'm a sound expert and this does sound kinda... weird. I'm sure Paige would know something more about it, so talk to her!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: This sounds interesting. As you may know, I'm a sound expert and this does sound kinda... weird. I'm sure Paige would know something more about it, so talk to her!
QUEST.TEXTEND: I know what this is. Nothing extraordinary. I'll give you a riddle and you need to solve it: "Only one other person besides me knows more about these sounds. He's hiding in a mysterious, cold, foggy and creepy place."

QUEST.NAME: UFO Sightnings
QUEST.TEXTSTART: I know what this is. Nothing extraordinary. I'll give you a riddle and you need to solve it: "Only one other person besides me knows more about these sounds. He's hiding in a mysterious, cold, foggy and creepy place."
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I know what this is. Nothing extraordinary. I'll give you a riddle and you need to solve it: "Only one other person besides me knows more about these sounds. He's hiding in a mysterious, cold, foggy and creepy place."
QUEST.TEXTEND: Yes, I do know what these sounds are from: aliens, which live on the moon! They were really kind and gave me some nice decorations - a clothes rack (you can put your astronaut suit on it!) and a small UFO for your treehouse. Take my items now because I'm going on a mission later!

QUEST.NAME: Moon Sandcastles
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Oh hey! Have you recently heard about an UFO sightning and some moon sand around? It's super cool! I'm wondering, can we make sandcastles from this moon sand? There's only one way to find out. Could you please bring me 7 piles of moon sand? Thanks in advance!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Moon sandcastles sound interesting to make. Will 7 piles of moon sand be enough, or we'll need more? Hmmm... Nevermind, we can always find some more moon sand in Bear Hollow, Shady Glen or Misty Hill.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Now we just have to take it to Coconut Beach and find out if we need to add water to it or something else. Thanks!

QUEST.NAME: Beautiful Souvenirs
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello fellow Panda pal! You seem to enjoy what's going on here a lot! So I suppose that you'll like my quest. I'd like to ask you to collect some Moon (also known as Ghost) flowers, some moonstone and some light opal gems with a beautiful moon color! These are beautiful souvenirs from this event, aren't they?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Opals and ghost flowers go very well together, they're awesome! You can find some of them in Misty Hill and Darby Field.
QUEST.TEXTEND: These do look awesome! Thank you buddy!

QUEST.NAME: Experimenting with Fruits
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey! I have decided to experiment with fruits and find out how moon substances affect them. I'd like to ask you to bring me 2 apples, 2 cherries and some moon sand.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Apples and cherries are usually found on Orchard trees. Moon sand can be found near the UFO.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Now it's time to see how it works out! I hope the moon sand makes them taste even better. It is said to be good for planting because it contains a lot of minerals.

QUEST.NAME: Blue Moon Ice Cream
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Greetings! Perhaps you're here to check what ice cream flavors I've got. Well, I decided to add something interesting for the Moon Festival to match the taste of the Pandanda Land citizens these days - a Blue Moon flavor! Well, for it I'll need some ingredients - a sugar beet, 5 blueberries and some milk. Could you bring me these?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: You can harvest blueberries in Harvest Grove and they'll make the ice cream look blue! Adding more milk and suger makes the color exactly the one we want.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Way to go! Now I've got what I need to make my new ice cream. Here's your reward.

QUEST.NAME: Moon Cake
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Oh hey! Perhaps you know how much I love making cakes. And I have decided to make one big cake for my fellow friends, including you! I'd like to be special for Moon Festival and I'm sure you'll love it. I'll only need some flour, some moon sand and some milk. I've got the rest!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Visit the farmers and I'm sure you can get from them what we need.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Here you go, a delicious piece of my new cake and also some coins for your BIG help! Thanks!

QUEST.NAME: Getting Sound Samples
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey hey hey! Lily's helping out Pandas with making music during this Music Festival! For sure, she's composing the BEST music out there. Of course, she needed help with building all this and now she needs help with assisting Pandas like you throughout their Superstar Journey. The first thing we'll start with is getting sound samples for composing your biggest hit. Use the Composer at Harvest Grove with at least 3 other Pandas!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: In order to start your Superstar Journey, you'll have to compose some samples at Harvest Grove using the Composer.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done! Check back later for the next part of your journey. Now, take this prize, you'll also need a suitable outfit when jamming later!

QUEST.NAME: Feeling the Rhythm
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Yeah there! Music Festival is in its full swing and I'm here to help you feel the rhythm! Your task is simple - find all the 10 Xs, go on them, dance on them and click on them!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Some of the Xs include dance floor locations. After you dance on all the 10 Xs, come back here, dance and click on the X.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Good moves! Well done mate, here's your prize. You're learning quickly!

QUEST.NAME: Wild Dances
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Yo! I may be selling fishing poles and other stuff here all day, but this doesn't mean that I don't like to dance! After William McWiggles helped you practice your dance moves, it's time to dance together with other Pandas! Find the place that I'll give you as a riddle and dance there with at least 4 other Pandas. And... here's the riddle: "Shake it off in front of a microphone, where folklore and modern world with orange color get together."
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: You gotta dance with at least 4 other Pandas, while shaking it off in front of a microphone, where folklore and modern world with orange color get together.
QUEST.TEXTEND: That was amazing! You really can dance with others! You can ask me whenever to join you in a band.

QUEST.NAME: Visiting a Performance
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there Panda pal! My friend Lily is performing in Purple Door and I recommend you to check her performance out! It's stunning, it's impressive! I also heard you're on your Superstar Journey. Go and see her, this will help you out a lot, learning from the professional! Watch it until the end and make sure to get her autograph by clicking on her!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Lily performs My Heart Will Go On. Isn't this song truly amazing?
QUEST.TEXTEND: You saw her performance? Great! I hope you were also impressed by it, My Heart Will Go On is just a beautiful song! Here's something for you.

QUEST.NAME: Watching a Concert With Friends
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello! If you've seen Lily's performance, then you'd probably love this task - bring some friends to her live concert! If not, what's better than attending a brand new performance with 5 other Pandas? Check out her live concert every 15 minutes in Purple Door! Make sure to wait until the end!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Check out Lily's performance in Purple Door with 5 friends and watch it until the end!
QUEST.TEXTEND: I'm pretty sure you'd love to visit it again and again, am I right? Here's something to remind you of today!

QUEST.NAME: Collecting Final Ideas
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey! It's time for the last step before you're ready to become a superstar. This one is easy - go around Pandanda and collect five sound recordings from the music that's playing in these rooms. You'll use them later as resources for ideas in order to prepare a set of songs!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Your task is simple - just collect 5 sound recordings from a few places in Pandanda and then you'll be ready to prepare your set of songs and become a superstar!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done! Now, you can start preparing your songs. Come back later and get ready to go BIG! I'm giving you this shirt as a symbol of the happiness you're going to feel in the end of your Superstar Journey.

QUEST.NAME: Becoming a Superstar
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day my fellow pianist! Seems like visiting The Den and playing the piano has helped out. It's your big day and it's time to shine - just like Lily! Go to West Market Street and enter the Concert Hall next to Purple Door. There, click Now Playing and choose a song to perform. Go to the scene and start performing in front of at least 5 pandas! Perform the song until its end!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Enter the Concert Hall in West Market Street next to Purple Door and become a superstar on the scene!
QUEST.TEXTEND: You're amazing! Phenomenal performance! Here's your Star Tee and remember - you're now a superstar and you have completed the Superstar Journey!

QUEST.NAME: Golden Rumors
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there! Today, I've got a special secret for you to discover. mPandanda Land has always been full of treasures, but recently, Pandas have started discovering golden treasures. Try finding some in Pawthorne Forest and fishing some from Fishing Hole and Coconut Beach.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Let's see if the old rumor is true: are there treasure chests to find in Pawthorne Forest and fish some from Fishing Hole and Coconut Beach.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done! Seems like it's all true: we can dig gold. Wondering what you can buy with it? Lily has the newest stuff on board. Check out if she can offer you something for the Panda Gold you can get from these chests.

QUEST.NAME: Flat Footballs
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Good day! Have you noticed flat footballs appearing around mPandanda recently? Seems like they just fall flat on the ground after Pandas kick them too hard. Can you find 5 of them appearing in other locations randomly and then find a tube of glue somewhere indoors so that I can fix them?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Flat footballs randomly appearing around definitely makes the landscape of our land worse.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for bringing me those! I'll make sure to fix them as soon as possible, we're on a shortage with footballs.

QUEST.NAME: Cutting the Grass
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey! As you probably know, I'm the green thumb of the land. So, I've noticed some grass being too tall in Bear Hollow, West Market Street and East Market Street. We need to make sure it's all cut, so could you look around carefully and cut it?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: We can't play football on a stadium with a grass that's way too grown, right?
QUEST.TEXTEND: I'm sure that all the football players are thankful for your good deed!

QUEST.NAME: Face Paint
QUEST.TEXTSTART: OMG, I'm a huge fan of face paints especially when it comes to football! That's sick dude! Can you go around and ask our fellas with the blue exclamations for some face paint of their color?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: What's your favorite face paint? I'll be putting on some green for the match tonight.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Sick colors! Let's go around and give some buckets away.

QUEST.NAME: Match Invitations
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there buddy! I'm a huge fan of football, or if you want, soccer, so I'm the one responsible to invite everybody to the match tonight. Can you give an invitation to every Panda with a blue exclamation mark?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: The best teams are playing at the match tonight - nobody should miss it!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for the help! It's definitely going to be an amazing match.

QUEST.NAME: Cleaning After the Match
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello! Last night there was a match at the Stadium and seems like the fans threw trash away, not in the bins, but all around. Could you help me out with cleaning up? Also, there's some old newspapers in Bear Hollow and West Market Street to be thrown away.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: People can't play football when it looks like a dump all around.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for helping me out with cleaning up! People will surely enjoy the match tonight again, make sure to raise awareness and tell everyone not to throw their trash around!

QUEST.NAME: The Beginning is Always Hard
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Arr harr! Aye! Pierre has told me you're up to your Pirate Journey. Wherever the wind blows gently, wherever the sun burns you nicely, wherever it sounds calming, wherever it's bright blue - that's the first place to go. Wherever this paradise is small and remote, that's the second place to go.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Hope you'll figure out my riddle! Wherever the wind blows gently, wherever the sun burns you nicely, wherever it sounds calming, wherever it's bright blue - that's the first place to go. Wherever this paradise is small and remote, that's the second place to go.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Aye! You've found the first map piece. Where to next, you'll find in the task to follow.

QUEST.NAME: Bumpy, Jumpy, Wild
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day me matey! It's time for your second task from your Pirate Journey. You'd ask, what is it? Bumpy, jumpy, that's where one goes. Not bumpy, not jumpy, wild, that's where the other one goes.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: That riddle is an easy one, I'm sure you'll figure it out!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done matey! Here's a prize for you and make sure to keep going on your Pirate Journey!

QUEST.NAME: Where Any Other Panda Goes
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Arr harr fella! Are you ready for a yet another prizelicious and delicious and adventurous part of your Pirate Jorney? Let's do this! Do you know where any other Panda goes? Do you know where cucumbers go? And do you really know where the fish goes?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Knowing mPandanda Land is very useful in this part of your Journey. Think beyond the borders!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Ayy, a very nice one, matey! Here's this fantasticious prize for you - don't give up, there's more to come!

QUEST.NAME: Row Row Your Boat
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day matey! Do ye think it's time to get into thay boat? Row, row, row your boat, gently down the stream! Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily, life is but a dream. And what about the mist in the sea, or more or less, on the land, arr?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Rowing your boat is an important skill of sailors, har har!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Har har! That ye be right! There be some prizes for ye. Don't forget to check out Row Your Boat game!

QUEST.NAME: The Fish Goes Glub Glub
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Ay, 'ello! Have you heard some interesting sounds, something in the water goes glub glub! You are asking where, that's near the starfish! And on the other end, we've got to harvest a map piece. So could you just check out what's going on with the glub-glubs and find the other map piece?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: That's a really mixed task, I know. But it's just some stuff to do if you're bored.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done on solving the riddle! Come back later in Bear Hollow, you're near the end of your Pirate Journey!

QUEST.NAME: The Cow Goes Moo
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Are you ready for the last Pirate Journey task? Here we go! The first map piece is wherever the cow goes moo and the second one is near a cage.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: This, being the last task, is an easy one.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Oh my, I've just been told that there's one more task left of your journey. Well, here's a prize for finding (almost) the last two pieces!

QUEST.NAME: The End of the Pirate Journey
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Arr harr, my fellow pirate! This ye be the final task of ye Pirate Journey! Are you ready to find the pirate booty? That ye be a hard task, har har! As the old pirate journal says, the treasure ye be in a land far, far away. Arr!
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Where thar far away land ye be?
QUEST.TEXTEND: You have found the treasure!

QUEST.NAME: Season's Greetings
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there! Ice cream has been on low demand recently. With Candy Festival starting, it's just become a mess and now people are looking for candy. So, I decided to offer my clients some new special seasonal ice cream flavors. Will you help me and bring me 4 Peanut Butter Bars, 1 Sugar Beet and a Quart of Cream?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Alright, this seasonal candy will be a hit for sure.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thanks for bringing me those! Now let's melt the peanut butter candy bar and make it into a special Candy Festival ice cream!

QUEST.NAME: Sugar and... Sugar?
QUEST.TEXTSTART: SUGAR SUGAR SUGAR! Oh, how much I love sugar! Awww man, I'm out of candy. I really need some. I know it's extremely bad for my health, but I promise, this will be my last candy intake for this festival. Will you find me some extra candy?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I really enjoy eating sweet stuff but I definitely should stop doing so.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Okay, I'll share this with you, I get it. I promised it was my last one. Here's some coins to thank you as well. HA! I GOT YOU! NEVER STOPPING! CANDY IS LOVE, CANDY IS LIFE! *runs away*

QUEST.NAME: Chocolate Supplies
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day, candy fan! As you probably know, Jack in The Orchard is trading some exclusive mPandanda Candy Bars for special amount of pieces of sweets collected. Pandas are so hyped that he needs large quantities of that mPandanda specialty. I'm going to look around for some chocolate, could you as well?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: As you have probably guessed, chocolate is the main ingredient of the mPD Candy Bar.
QUEST.TEXTEND: That's really sweet of you, Lily and I have also collected a few more chocolates. I'll now use my special machine to make some of those, following the special recipe. Special ingredient? Panda love.

QUEST.NAME: Lemon Candy
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey! Candy Festival is in its full swing and we've got loads of candy in. I really want to join in the huge sale with a special sour and sweet candy: lemon candy. Let's collect some fresh ingredients from The Orchard together: 2 Large Sugar Beets, 2 Medium Sugar Beets and 5 Lemons.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Many Pandas enjoy the sour and sweet taste, I hope they'll like my special candy flavor as well.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you! Now let's get this special candy made.

QUEST.NAME: Eating Healthy
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Okay, what's this euphoria? I bet it's due to that sugar overload. Really, Pandas need to stop eating that much candy. I've figured out the best way to promote healthy eating: we'll promote fruits and vegetables as candy. Let's say peaches and apples will be the sweet ones, whereas the tomatoes will be the sour ones. Of course, sugar-free.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: We should act now or Pandas won't stop indulging with that much candy, that's totally wrong.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you so much for supporting my idea! Now it's time to promote it around. Are you in?

QUEST.NAME: Hot Sweet Cucumbers
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Thanks for stopping by, I've got to tell you something. Well, I'm completely supporting Maggie: this candy euphoria is not my cup of tea at all. However, my taste is a little bit odd, so I just can't go completely healthy. So let's see, I enjoy cucumbers, chili peppers and the sweet tase of sugar. So, I suppose I'll need a Sugar Beet, several Cucumbers, a few Chili Peppers and a Quart of Cream - that's to use as a base for the mix. Sounds weird, but I hope it'll work out well.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: This mix is weird indeed. But it's worth it to try.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you, now I gonna mix it, let's see what happens. Stop by later in order to get some feedback if you want!

QUEST.NAME: Festival Preparations
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there! Dragon Festival has just started but it isn't really ready, there's some more stuff to be done. We need to blow up some balloons with helium and make final constructions with wood. Will you find 2 Helium Tanks that may be lost around the 'stars' or near a sweet water coast, as well as 4 pieces of Fresh Cut Wood from Pawthorne Forest?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: The final constructions won't take long, we will have everything set up in no time, especially with your help.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you so much for the help, now we can finish the Festival in full speed! Your daily prize is a Light Blue Pet Cap!

QUEST.NAME: Dragon Beds
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day, fella! Dragon Festival is going great, isn't it? I really want to help Izzy so I've decided to make some little cute pet dragon beds. I'll need some materials, though: 4 pieces of Fresh Cut Wood from the Forest, paint from the famous Pandas that are willing to give out some for free and a Tube of Glue, hidden somewhere indoors.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: I have a really neat concept for them and I'll greatly appreciate it if you help me with the materials.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Now I get my concept done, thank you! Your daily prize is a Blue Bed!

QUEST.NAME: Pet Mats
QUEST.TEXTSTART: It's the pets season and I thought that it'd be a good idea to knit some mats. I'm out of spools of thread and paint, but I'm sure you can find some by asking some of the famous Pandas around.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Those are going to look really cute, can't wait!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you so much for helping me out with my cute mats! Your daily prize is an Orange Pet Mat!

QUEST.NAME: Finding Food
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey! There has been a high demand in the field of pet adoption recently and food is insufficient. Will you help me find 4 lost Bags of Pet Food?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Those pets are really hungry. Better feed them soon!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Yay, all the pets are now happy! Your daily prize is a Pets Tee!

QUEST.NAME: Light It Up
QUEST.TEXTSTART: It's so nice to see you! Dragon Festival needs some lights put here and there but for that we need some strings and wiring. I'll do the wiring, but I'll need you to see if any Pandas can give you lightbulbs as well as some thicker thread in order to fix some of the bulbs properly. For the wiring, we'll need a few pieces of iron string that can be found in West Market Street, I suppose.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Scotch tape for fixing the bulbs is way old-fashioned. Thread for the win!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Thank you for helping me out, now Jim and I are going to do the wiring. Let's light it up! Your daily prize is a Pet Lamp!

QUEST.NAME: Entertaining Pets
QUEST.TEXTSTART: What a nice day to have fun with pets! Today, I will be doing some clown tricks with them but I need a special outfit. Can you find by any chance any Panda that has a spare Clown Wig and a Red Nose?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Clowns are not necessarily scary. I'll be a funny clown!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Sweet, now it's my time to shine: I'll show that clowns are not necessarily scary, they can be funny and cute! Your daily prize is Ice Pet Wings!

QUEST.NAME: Lost Dragons
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hey there! With the beginning of Dragon Festival many Pandas have tamed dragons. However, many have escaped and now are roaming around mPandanda! Will you find all of them?
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Those dragons could have flown anywhere. Better find them soon!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done, not many can tame 10 dragons altogether! Your daily prize is A Firebreather Mask!

QUEST.NAME: Grassy Lime
QUEST.TEXTSTART: G'day fellow Panda Pal! Today's task is easy: we need some grass clippings in order to color some pets. Oh, and some water resistant glue to glue the clippings to them.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: Painting the pets in green, what an idea!
QUEST.TEXTEND: Good job fella! We've got a new pet color - a Lime Pet! Your daily prize is a Lime Pet, that's now waiting for you in your treehouse!

QUEST.NAME: Taming a Dragon
QUEST.TEXTSTART: Hello there and welcome back. It's your very important day. A few Pandas have seen a new dragon going around mPandanda wildly. You need to help me with taming it. It can be literally anywhere - indoors and outdoors.
QUEST.TEXTACTIVE: This dragon has to be tamed quickly.
QUEST.TEXTEND: Well done and congratulations on taming this dragon! The codename for your daily prize is: RAINBOWDRAGON.
